title: Sexual Abuse in Christian Homes and Churches - Collection 15
description:
Sexual Abuse in Christian Homes and Churches - Collection 15:

We  have 35 titles here:

-  A Report on the Crisis in the Catholic Church in the United States, The National Review Board for the Protection of Children and Young People(2004)

-  Adams - Silently Seduced; When Parents Make Their Children Partners (2011)

-  Ambrosio (Ed.) - On Incest; Psychoanalytic Perspectives (2005)

-  Barnett - Dangerous Desire; Literature of Sexual Freedom and Sexual Violence Since the Thirties (2004)

-  Bentovim - Trauma-Organized Systems; Physical and Sexual Abuse in Families (1992)

-  Bergen (Ed.) - Issues in Intimate Violence (1998)

-  Berry - Lead Us Not into Temptation; Catholic Priests and the Sexual Abuse of Children (2000)

-  Bravehearts - Child Sexual Assault; Facts and Statistics (Dec 2012)

-  Duckett & Duckett - Stolen Voices; a Sadistic Step-Father, Two Children Violated, Their Battle for Justice (2014)

-  Ellsworth - Choosing to Heal; Using Reality Therapy in the Treatment of Sexually Abused Children (2007)

-  Frawley-O'Dea - The Experience of the Victim of Sexual Abuse; a Reflection (2002)

-  Frawley-O'Dea & Goldner (Eds.) - Predatory Priests, Silenced Victims; the Sexual Abuse Crisis and the Catholic Church (2007)

-  Glass - Girl Alone (2015)

-  Glatt - Secrets in the Cellar; a True Story of the Austrian Incest Case That Shocked the World (2009)

-  Goldstein - The Sexual Exploitation of Children; a Practical Guide to Assessment, Investigation, and Intervention, 2e (1999)

-  Haines - The Survivor's Guide to Sex; How to Have an Empowered Sex Life After Childhood Sexual Abuse (1999)

-  Hall & Lloyd - Surviving Child Sexual Abuse; a Handbook for Helping Women Challenge Their Past, 2e (1993)

-  Harding - Asking for It; the Alarming Rise of Rape Culture - and What We Can Do About It (2015)

-  Harline - The Burdens of Sister Margaret; Inside a 17th-Century Convent (2000)

-  Knight - Finding Me; a Decade of Darkness, a Life Reclaimed (2014)

-  Krakauer - Missoula; Rape and the Justice System in a College Town (2015)

-  Lew - Victims No Longer; the Classic Guide for Men Recovering from Sexual Child Abuse (2004)

-  Melrose & Pearce (Eds.) - Critical Perspectives on Child Sexual Exploitation and Related Trafficking (2013)

-  Mrazek & Kempe (Eds.) - Sexually Abused Children and Their Families (1987)

-  O'Gorman - Trials and Persecutions of Miss Edith O'Gorman, Otherwise Sister Teresa De Chantal, of St. Joseph's Convent (1871)

-  Report on the Implementation of the Charter for the Protection of Children and Young People; 2014 Annual Report (2015)

-  Rich - Juvenile Sexual Offenders; a Comprehensive Guide to Risk Evaluation (2009)

-  Rufo - Sexual Predators Amongst Us (2012)

-  Russell - Behind Closed Doors in White South Africa; Incest Survivors Tell Their Stories (1997)

-  Sacco - Unspeakable; Father-Daughter Incest in American History (2009)

-  Schlesinger - Sexual Murder; Catathymic and Compulsive Homicides (2005)

-  Smith (Ed.) - Child Sexual Abuse; Issues and Challenges (2008)

-  Stevens - Inside the Mind of Sexual Offenders; Predatory Rapists, Pedophiles, and Criminal Profiles (2001)

-  Waldram - Hound Pound Narrative; Sexual Offender Habilitation and the Anthropology of Therapeutic Intervention (2012)

-  Watson - A Stolen Childhood; a Dark Past, a Terrible Secret, a Girl without a Future (2015)
